testCategories.name: Touchability & Interaction
testCategories.description: Verifies UI elements are easily tappable and responsive

tests.name: UI Elements are easily tappable (minimum 48x48dp)
tests.description: Semua tombol dan elemen interaktif berukuran minimal 48x48dp untuk mudah disentuh

tests.name: Visual feedback on button press (ripple effect)
tests.description: Ripple effect tersedia pada button press untuk memberikan visual feedback

tests.name: App responsive to common gestures (swipe, scroll)
tests.description: App responsif terhadap gesture swipe dan scroll dengan smooth

testCategories.name: Visual Design & Readability
testCategories.description: Checks text readability, contrast, and icon visibility

tests.name: Text is readable with sufficient size and contrast
tests.description: Text size 14sp untuk body text dan 24sp+ untuk headlines dengan contrast yang proper

tests.name: Icons are visible and distinguishable
tests.description: Semua icons meaningful dan mudah dibedakan satu sama lain

tests.name: Color contrast for accessibility
tests.description: Color scheme memenuhi WCAG 2.1 standards untuk accessibility

testCategories.name: Navigation & Information Architecture
testCategories.description: Verifies navigation intuitiveness and page hierarchy

tests.name: Navigation is intuitive - tab bar/navigation visible
tests.description: Bottom navigation bar intuitif dan mudah diakses dari setiap halaman

tests.name: Bottom navigation is accessible and responsive
tests.description: Bottom navigation items accessible dan responsive terhadap user interaction

tests.name: Page transitions are smooth and intuitive
tests.description: Transisi antar halaman smooth dan tidak mengganggu user experience

testCategories.name: User Feedback Mechanisms
testCategories.description: Checks feedback on actions, errors, and loading states

tests.name: Loading indicators are visible during data fetch
tests.description: Loading spinner atau progress indicator muncul saat fetching data

tests.name: Error messages are clear and visible
tests.description: Error messages jelas, visible, dan memberikan actionable information

tests.name: User feedback - confirm actions before delete/logout
tests.description: Confirmation dialog muncul sebelum aksi destruktif seperti delete atau logout

tests.name: Empty states show helpful messages
tests.description: Empty state messages informatif dan membantu user understand situasi

testCategories.name: Responsive Design
testCategories.description: Verifies layout and content on different screen sizes

tests.name: Content is not cut off on smaller screens
tests.description: Layout adaptif pada screen kecil (360x640) tanpa konten yang terpotong

tests.name: Screen rotation handled
tests.description: App handle landscape dan portrait orientation dengan baik

testCategories.name: Form & Input Design
testCategories.description: Checks form field labels and input accessibility

tests.name: Form fields are clearly labeled and interactive
tests.description: Form fields memiliki label yang jelas dan mudah diisi

tests.name: Text input fields accessible and usable
tests.description: Input fields accessible dengan keyboard yang sesuai

testCategories.name: State Management
testCategories.description: Verifies app stability and state preservation

tests.name: Memory management - long running app
tests.description: App tetap responsif dan stable saat running lama

tests.name: App maintains state during minimal interruption
tests.description: App dapat recover state properly saat interruption minimal

wcag2_1_levelA.description: Aplikasi memenuhi WCAG 2.1 Level A standards

wcag2_1_levelAA.description: Aplikasi partially memenuhi WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards

colorContrast.details: Menggunakan Material Design color scheme dengan proper contrast

testScenarios.name: User Login Flow
testScenarios.description: Testing login process from splash to home page
testScenarios.expectedResult: Successfully login and navigate to home page
observations: Form fields visible dan dapat diisi dengan mudah
Tombol login responsive dan besar cukup
Navigasi ke home page smooth setelah berhasil

testScenarios.name: Browse Events
testScenarios.description: Testing event browsing and detail view
testScenarios.expectedResult: View events list and navigate to detail page successfully

testScenarios.name: Error Handling
testScenarios.description: Testing app behavior during error conditions
testScenarios.expectedResult: Clear error message with retry option
observations: Error messages clear dan visible untuk user
User dapat melakukan retry dengan mudah
App tidak crash saat error terjadi

strengths.title: Material Design 3 Compliance
strengths.description: Aplikasi mengikuti design guidelines Flutter dengan ketat, memastikan consistency dan familiarity untuk users.

strengths.title: Responsive Layout
strengths.description: Works seamlessly pada berbagai screen sizes mulai dari small phones hingga tablets.

strengths.title: Clear Navigation
strengths.description: Bottom navigation bar yang intuitif memudahkan users untuk berpindah antar fitur.

strengths.title: Proper Feedback Mechanisms
strengths.description: Loading states, error messages, dan success indicators yang jelas membantu users understand app state.

strengths.title: Accessibility Considerations
strengths.description: Color contrast, text size, dan touch target size memenuhi accessibility standards.

recommendations.title: Keyboard Type for Form Inputs
recommendations.description: Pastikan semua form inputs memiliki keyboard type yang sesuai (email, number, phone, dll) untuk better user experience.

recommendations.title: Haptic Feedback
recommendations.description: Tambahkan vibration feedback saat user interaction untuk better tactile response di devices yang support.

recommendations.title: Offline-First Capability
recommendations.description: Implementasi offline-first approach untuk data loading agar app tetap functional tanpa internet.

recommendations.title: Skeleton Loading
recommendations.description: Tambahkan skeleton loaders untuk better perceived performance dibanding blank screens.

recommendations.title: Swipe-to-Refresh Gesture
recommendations.description: Implementasi pull-to-refresh di halaman list untuk intuitive data refresh mechanism.

recommendations.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
recommendations.description: Tambahkan breadcrumb untuk navigasi yang lebih jelas terutama di halaman nested.

recommendations.title: Internationalization (i18n)
recommendations.description: Lokalisasi semua strings untuk akses yang lebih luas ke different user groups.

recommendations.title: Dark Mode Support
recommendations.description: Tambahkan dark mode untuk users yang prefer dark themes dan better battery life.

recommendations.title: Animation Performance
recommendations.description: Optimasi animation performance untuk devices yang lebih lama agar tetap smooth.

recommendations.title: Onboarding Tutorial
recommendations.description: Tambahkan onboarding tutorial untuk new users yang belum familiar dengan app.

overallConclusion.summary: Aplikasi Info Warga sudah memenuhi standar usability yang sangat baik dengan fokus pada user experience, accessibility, dan responsive design.
nextSteps: Continue running usability tests dengan setiap release
Conduct user testing sessions dengan real users
Gather user feedback melalui in-app analytics
Iterate dan improve berdasarkan feedback yang dikumpulkan
